title: Class diagram for Book class - determine design

content.description:
The Book class will contain attributes for a book’s title, author, and number of pages. The class will also contain methods to allow the attributes to be accessed outside the class.
A class design diagram for the Book class will contain three sections. The first section contains the class name, the second section contains three instance variables and their data types, and the third section contains three methods and their return types. The + symbol indicates a public designation, and the - symbol indicates a private designation.
content.question: Of the following diagrams, which represents the most appropriate design for the Book class?

choices.label:
The diagram has 3 sections containing text as follows:

Section 1:

Book

Section 2:

+ title : String

+ author : String

+ numPages : String

Section 3:

- getTitle() : String

- getAuthor() : String

- getNumPages() : String

The diagram has 3 sections containing text as follows:

Section 1:

Book

- numPages : String

Section 3:

+ getTitle() : String

+ getAuthor() : String

+ getNumPages() : String

The diagram has 3 sections containing text as follows:

Section 1:

Book

Section 2:

+ title : String

+ author : String

+ numPages : int

Section 3:

- getTitle() : String

- getAuthor() : String

- getNumPages() : int

The diagram has 3 sections containing text as follows:

Section 1:

Book

Section 2:

- title : String

- author : String

- numPages : int

Section 3:

+ getTitle() : String

+ getAuthor() : String

+ getNumPages() : int

content.answer:
The diagram has 3 sections containing text as follows:

Section 1:

Book

Section 2:

- title : String

- author : String

- numPages : int

Section 3:

+ getTitle() : String

+ getAuthor() : String

+ getNumPages() : int

skill.text: 1.A: Determine an appropriate program design to solve a problem or accomplish a task.
